signalpool.description: The common global signal pool, all signals will be stored here
signalpool.name: sp_common

task.description: This task will contain all IO operations, e.g: joystick, engine...
task.name: tsk_io

task.description: Task control will call the application code (control algorithm)
task.name: tsk_control

task.description: Task to measure the age of the signals
task.name: tsk_system

signalobject.description: Joystick x,y for controlling the car manually
signalobject.name: so_joystick

signalobject.description: Target speed defined by the user or the ADAS algorithm
signalobject.name: so_speed

signalobject.description: Engine value to be written to the RGB LED
signalobject.name: so_engine

signalobject.description: Brakelight signal sent to the red LED
signalobject.name: so_brakelight

swc.description: Component reading the ADC values from the driver
swc.name: swc_joystick

swc.description: SWC containing algorithm for speed calculation
swc.name: swc_control

runnable.description: Runnable to update the joystick signal using the API pullPort()
runnable.name: JOYSTICK_readJoystick_run

runnable.description: Runnable to check value of joystick signal and update speed signal
runnable.name: CONTROL_calcControl_run

runnable.description: Runnable to copy the engine signal to the speed signal
runnable.name: ENGINE_setEngine_run

runnable.description: Runnable to set the value of brakelight based on speed signal value
runnable.name: BRAKELIGHT_setBrakelight_run

event.description: Event is triggered on update of Joystick data
event.name: ev_joystick_onData

event.description: Event is triggered on update of Speed signal
event.name: ev_speed_onData

event.description: Tick Event for the IO task
event.name: ev_tick_1ms
